Detailed Description

This class handles figures, and can output them in .fig format.
Author:
Anthony Liekens

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Figure::Justifications
 

Enumeration of justifications. The following justifications can be used to set the justification of a figure object : {\tt Center, FlushLeft}

Enumeration values:
Center 
FlushLeft 

enum Figure::MultiplePages
 

Enumeration of multiple pages types. The following types can be used to set the multiple page property of a figure object : {\tt Single, Multiple}

Enumeration values:
Single 
Multiple 

enum Figure::Orientations
 

Enumeration of orientations. The following orientations can be used to set the orientation of a figure object : {\tt Landscape, Portrait}

Enumeration values:
Landscape 
Portrait 

enum Figure::Papersizes
 

Enumeration of papersizes. The following papersizes can be used to set the papersize of a figure object : {\tt Letter, Legal, Ledger, Tabloid, A, B, C, D, E, A4, A3, A2, A1, A0, B5}

Enumeration values:
Letter 
Legal 
Ledger

B 
C 
D 
E 
A4 
A3 
A2 
A1 
A0 
B5 

enum Figure::Units
 

Enumeration of units. The following units can be used to set the units of a figure object : {\tt Metric, Inches}

Enumeration values:
Metric 
Inches
